description.value:
Antigravity belt often used by Eldar. Gives Hover (6) Trait and +20 to all Agility-based tests while activated. Requires Pilot (Personal) Skill to use. Flip Belts are always at least Good Craftsmanship

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
